criteria: All E2E tests for check-in/out and offline mode passing on both iOS and Android; No P1/P2 bugs related to core attendance; Accessibility audit (from Sprint 1) passed on all new screens.

criteria: 100% of Firestore Security Rule tests passing; Audit log immutability confirmed; All high-privilege actions (Admin edit, approvals) are correctly logged; No security vulnerabilities found in SonarQube scan.
success_metrics: The system's data integrity and access control mechanisms are verified as secure and reliable.
